title: Super Bowl Reactions and Offseason Story Lines With Mina Kimes, Ty Law, Ted Nguyen, and Geoff Schwartz | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 398)
description:
Robert Mays is joined by The Athletic’s Ted Nguyen to break down the Patriots' dominant defensive performance against the Rams and Sean McVay’s future (1:20), before speaking with former NFL cornerback Ty Law on his recent Hall of Fame induction and his experience of playing in a Super Bowl under Bill Belichick (15:15). Later, Mays is joined by former NFL offensive lineman Geoff Schwartz to break down the Patriots' play-calling in the trenches (32:45) and by Mina Kimes to look ahead at the biggest story lines of the offseason (48:30).
Host: Robert Mays
Guests: Mina Kimes, Ty Law, Ted Nguyen, and Geoff Schwartz

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
